root.name: Moon Dust
root.description: Moondust features colorful visuals and an electronic soundtrack that is determined by the gameplay. The player controls an astronaut who flies around the screen, leaving trails that destroy enemy ships. Moondust has significant historical importance in being potentially one of the first video games to be recognized as art and featured in art exhibitions. The game has had an apparent influence on Jeff Minter's work. External links Wikipedia: Moondust
